feed.title: Track Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: Boilerplates for mobile and web apps

entry.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Apr 01, 2023
entry.content:
IOS Development.

  • Swift 5 Module Template (⭐477) Boilerplate for reusable Swift 5 modules.

Microservices

  • Webstack-micro (⭐89) Demo/starter for full-stack web app using microservices architecture, with API Gateway, centralized authentication, background workers, and WebSockets.

Python

  • BeautyNet (⭐190) A research project template for PyTorch.

Websites

  • HTML Website Template (⭐38) Starting point for collaboratively-edited HTML websites
  • Nextjs Blog Starter Starter code for your blog based on Next.js framework

  • hasura/hello-python-flask A boilerplate Flask application which can be deployed in 3 mins, with ready-to-use database, authentication and file APIs.

entry.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Feb 05, 2017
entry.content:
Android Development

  • Beginning Android Resources (⭐28k) Android Guide.
  • Universal Music Player (⭐13k) Google sample application that shows how to implement an audio media app that works across multiple form factors and provides a consistent user experience on Android phones, tablets, Auto, Wear and Cast devices.
  • Android Architecture Blueprints (⭐45k) Demonstrates a basic Model-View-Presenter architecture and showcases various TODO app implementations.

IOS Development.

  • iOS Boilerplate (⭐2.8k) Boilerplate by Gimeno.

entry.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Nov 29, 2015

  • Angular Gulp Ionic Boilerplate (⭐76) Ionic framework boilerplate for writing apps using Gulp and EcmaScript6.

entry.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Oct 12, 2015
entry.content:
Python

  • Django Starter Template (⭐155) An easy to use project template for Django that follows best practices.

entry.title: Awesome Projects Boilerplates Updates on Jul 11, 2015
entry.content:
Android Development

  • Android Bootstrap (⭐1) A template/bootstrap/boilerplate application that includes tons of great open source tools and frameworks.
  • Android Material Drawer Template (⭐674) An Android template with navigation drawer for material design.
  • material-design-icons-adt-template (⭐438) Android Studio / Eclipse ADT template for material-design-icons resources.
  • AndroidKickststarter (⭐607) Framework kickstarts development which help you focus on coding.
  • Android Annotations (⭐11k) Fast Android Development. Easy maintainance.
  • Android Cookbook Examples (⭐1k) Collected code examples from the O'Reilly Android Cookbook.
  • Android Basic Samples (⭐979) Mostly game oriented samples.
  • Android Webview Sample App (⭐64) Webview Sample App
  • Android Quickstart (⭐239) Quickstart application showing the Google Drive API for Android.

IOS Development.

  • Amaro (⭐387) Featureful iOS Boilerplate.
  • Boilerplate-iOS (⭐8) Boilerplate by openaphid.

Python

  • Django Hackathon Starter (⭐1.6k) A boilerplate for Django web applications, providing various social logins and several popular API examples.
  • bootstrapy (⭐289) A bootstrap Python application, so that you can focus on writing code.
  • Fbone (⭐1.7k) Fbone (Flask bone) is a Flask (Python microframework) template/bootstrap/boilerplate application.
  • Flask-Bootstrap (⭐212) A Flask app template with integrated SQLAlchemy, authentication, and Bootstrap frontend.
  • Flask Boilerplate (⭐9) A very simple flask boilerplate with folder structures.
  • Flask Foundation (⭐1.3k) App built with best practices.
  • GoogleAppEngine Webapp2 Boilerplate (⭐681) A Complete boilerplate for Python Webapp2 on Google App Engine
  • Flask Appengine Template (⭐1.1k) Flask App engine Template

PHP

  • Laravel Angular CouchDB (⭐10) Laravel Angular CouchDB Boilerplate

Ruby

  • AngularJS Rails Templates (⭐567) Rails and Angular Tempate.
  • AngularJS Sinatra Bootstrap Angular Sinatra Bootstrap template.
  • Rails Composer Use Rails Composer to generate any of the example applications from the RailsApps project.

.NET

  • ASP.NET Boilerplate (⭐12k) ASP.NET Boilerplate is a starting point for new modern web applications using best practices and most popular tools.
